Package com.dhemery.configuring

Translate configuration options to and from various representations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Configuration
    A set of named configuration options that can be queried and transformed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationBuilder
    Builds transforming configurations.
    LoadProperties
    Static utility methods to load properties from property files and resources.
    MappedDictionary
    A dictionary stored in a Map.
    PropertiesDictionary
    A dictionary stored in a Properties.
    TransformingConfiguration
    A configuration that applies a sequence of operators when an option is queried.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigurationException
    Reports that an element of a configuration is invalid.

Package com.dhemery.configuring Description

Translate configuration options to and from various representations.
